channel.title: Poss loss possess ability if hit visit immune
channel.description:
#### What happened? Am poss am try to possess someone, that person is visit immune, next night I don't have it anymore
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? This is unfair I should retain usage
#### Steps to reproduce: Be poss try to possess merc target
#### Comments: It lead to my losing
